meanings.sent1: The colors of the distinctest flowers in the garden were red and yellow.
meanings.sent2: Her distinctest feature was her bright blue eyes.
meanings.sent3: The distinctest cat in the neighborhood always wore a tiny hat.
meanings.sent4: The distinctest sound in the forest was the howl of the lone wolf.
meanings.sent5: The distinctest smell in the bakery was the aroma of freshly baked bread.

meanings.definition: Standing out as different or unique.
meanings.sent1: Among the students, his distinctest talent was his ability to juggle.
meanings.sent2: The distinctest building in the city was the one with the golden dome.
meanings.sent3: The distinctest cloud in the sky looked like a giant fluffy bunny.
meanings.sent4: Her distinctest memory was of dancing in the rain with her friends.
meanings.sent5: The distinctest flavor in the soup was the hint of exotic spices.
